alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 10:40PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong shower will impact portions of eastern Leon County through 1115 PM EST... At 1039 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong shower near Florida A And M, or near Tallahassee, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida A And M, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Ralford Greenway, Macon Community Park, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Killearn Estates, Chaires, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall, Pisgah Church, Springsax Park, Belair, Apalachee Regional Park, Levy Park and Indian Head Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM EST for Big Bend of Florida.
